name: Kid Mix Section: Character Collection
overview: KID Mix Section Character Collection is a mix between an adventure and a mahjong game. The game features character of others KID games (like Infinity, Emmyrea, Memories Off, etc). The game's plot is about somekind of fairy that knows that something is not right in the world and to discover what's wrong she will have to recruit some characters, but to recruit them she have to defeat them in a mahjong game. The mahjong part of the game is like another mahjong game (a game up for four players that originated in China. Mahjong involves skill, strategy, and calculation, as well as a certain degree of chance. Depending on the variation which is played, luck can be anything from a minor to a dominant factor in success. In Asia, mahjong is also popularly played as a gambling game) but using different characters for each KID game to make the different combinations. For example if the player have to play mahjong against a character from Infinity the mahjong game will use Infinity characters pieces to play and make the combinations.
